title: Reconstruction / Redevelopment of existing building are permitted without considering minimum area of plot and FSI shall be as per above table or FSI utilized for the existing authorized structure
clause_text: Reconstruction / Redevelopment of existing building are permitted without considering minimum area of plot and FSI shall be as per above table or FSI utilized for the existing authorized structure. Minimum plot size norms shall not be applicable to "Bread and Breakfast Scheme" approved by M.T.D.C. Following villages are identified as Tourism growth centers - Kunkeshwar - Mithbav, Hindale, Achara, Tondavali, Mahapan, Shiroada - Aravali, Amboli and Phonda.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Reconstruction / Redevelopment of existing building are permitted without considering minimum area of plot and FSI shall be as per above table or FSI utilized for the existing authorized structure.
